org.trimou.engine.locator

Class PathTemplateLocator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trimou.engine.config.AbstractConfigurationAware
      • org.trimou.engine.locator.AbstractTemplateLocator
        • org.trimou.engine.locator.PathTemplateLocator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the source of the template path (e.g. File, String,...)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationAware, TemplateLocator, WithPriority
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassPathTemplateLocator, FilePathTemplateLocator

    public abstract class PathTemplateLocator<T>
extends AbstractTemplateLocator
    Represents a template locator where the template identifier is a path.
    Author:
    Martin Kouba
